translations.name: Analytical-Literal Translation of the Bible
translations.description: This is a word for word translation of the LXX Septuagint, the primary Bible of the Early Church. Translated in several different volumes by Gary F. Zeolla, this translation allows the reader to come as close to the original Greek text as possible without having to know or be proficient in Greek.

translations.name: Hans Lufft
translations.description_short: Hans Lufft was a German printer and publisher. In 1534 he printed at Wittenberg the first complete edition of Luther's Bible, in two quarto volumes with illuminations by Lucas Cranach.
